Solar-Powered Knife: A knife with solar panels on its handle, which can recharge its battery when exposed to sunlight.
LED Light Knife: A knife with an LED light installed in the blade or handle, which makes it easier to see when cutting in dim light conditions.
Anti-Slip Handle: A knife with an ergonomic grip that's designed to prevent slipping when in use.
Self-Disinfecting Knife: A knife with a built-in mechanism that can sterilize the blade after each use, which can improve food safety.
Knife Sharpener: A knife with a built-in sharpener, which can be used to keep the blade in top condition.
